00036 #define KVSCSC(_name) bool _name(KviKvsRunTimeContext * __pContext,KviKvsVariantList * __pParams,KviKvsSwitchList * __pSwitches)
00037 
00038 #define KVSCSC_pContext __pContext
00039 #define KVSCSC_pParams __pParams
00040 #define KVSCSC_pSwitches __pSwitches
00041 
00042 #define KVSCSC_PARAMETER(a,b,c,d) KVS_PARAMETER(a,b,c,d)
00043 
00044 #define KVSCSC_PARAMETERS_BEGIN \
00045         KVS_PARAMETERS_BEGIN(parameter_format_list)
00046 
00047 #define KVSCSC_PARAMETERS_END \
00048         KVS_PARAMETERS_END \
00049         if(!KviKvsParameterProcessor::process(KVSCSC_pParams,KVSCSC_pContext,parameter_format_list))return false;
00050 
00051 #define KVSCSC_REQUIRE_CONNECTION \
00052         if(!KVSCSC_pContext->window()->context())return KVSCSC_pContext->errorNoIrcContext(); \
00053         if(!KVSCSC_pContext->window()->connection())return KVSCSC_pContext->warningNoIrcConnection();
00054 
00055 #define KVSCSC_pWindow __pContext->window()
00056 #define KVSCSC_pConnection __pContext->window()->connection()
00057 #define KVSCSC_pIrcContext __pContext->context()
